item.description:
I'll be at the will-call booth at 10 a.m. I bought my ticket in advance so I will definitely be there, I hope we have good weather! FYI, you can get tickets at a small discount through http://www.goldstar.c..., it is half-price but then you pay a $2.50 service charge so it's $7.50 instead of $10. Goldstar is free to join and it gives you discounts on events.

This looks like a cool blend of history, cute animals, crafts, and food! Gore Place presents its annual Sheepshearing Festival. This popular tradition features a wide range of activities â€” demonstrations of traditional farming and crafting (including sheepshearing and herding dogs), lively music, Morris dancers, performers, historic recreators, farm animals, wagon rides and a large crafts fair. New this year, guests can visit the Scottish Village, with kilt making, weaving, Scottish lore and a bagpipe band.
item.name: Sheepshearing/Crafts Festival at Historic Gore Place in Waltham
